description: Mapping from the ordering by product (A027750, A056538) to the ordering by sum (A002260, A004736) of ordered pairs (a,b), a>=1, b>=1.
links: Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
maple: ordered_pair_perm := proc(upto_n) local a,i,j; a := []; for i from 1 to upto_n do for j in sort(divisors(i)) do a := [op(a),binomial(((i/j) + j - 1),2)+j]; od; od; RETURN(a); end;
mathematica: max = 21; A056534 = {}; For[i = 1, i <= max, i++, Do[ AppendTo[ A056534, Binomial[i/j + j - 1, 2] + j], {j, Divisors[i]}]]; A056534 (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Oct 05 2012, after Maple *)
author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 20, 2000
